pages.text: Rumor has it, there's a strange creature that likes eating $(item)Coal$() in the $(thing)Nether$(). If you tame one and let it rest over a $(item)Furnace$(), it'll make it go faster!
Tame yourself a fiery beast, and bring it back home to smelt items faster.$(br2)Make sure you have some $(thing)Fire Resistance$()!
